page.title: 08MARKETS IN GAINSBOROUGH
page.content: Markets are held on Tuesdays and Saturdays in the Town Centre and Silver Street.Until recently a Butter market was held on the ground floor of the Town Hall.A new Market Hall has been opened next to the bus station. The ground floor of the Town Hall has been redesigned and changed into shops.In our survey,the Market traders said that they came from Nottingham, Leeds,Doncaster,Lincoln and Rotherham. We looked at the stalls and saw the following items being sold:-Fruit and vegetables ,clothing,material,linen,tools,basket- ware,plants,socks,toiletries,shoes, crockery and antiques.
